sentences.en: " Only the honor of a warrior is unbreakable even by death itself. "
sentences.cn: “ 即使肉体死去,战士的荣誉也是永恒不灭的. ”

sentences.en: " Prisoner, tell me, who was it that wrought this unbreakable chain? "
sentences.cn: “ 囚人, 告诉我, 是谁铸的这条坚牢的锁链? ”

sentences.en: Any unbreakable promise isn't better than the moment we are together.
sentences.cn: 任何情比金坚的约定,都比不上我们此刻在一起.

sentences.en: Are they made of unbreakable glass?
sentences.cn: 是不会破裂的镜片 吗 ?

sentences.en: Lightweight and unbreakable, they are particularly suitable for carbonated beverages.
sentences.cn: 轻便 、 不易碎,这种材料尤其适合碳酸类饮料的包装.

sentences.en: Mr Jones: shockproof, rustproof, dustproof, and unbreakable.
sentences.cn: 琼斯先生: 防震, 防锈, 防尘并且摔不坏.

sentences.en: On the Israeli - Palestinian issue, Mr Obama said the bond with Israel was " unbreakable "
sentences.cn: 关于以巴问题, 奥巴马先生说与以色列的关系 “ 牢不可破 ”

sentences.en: One quality of this plastic is that it is almost unbreakable.
sentences.cn: 这种塑料有个特点是不易断裂.

sentences.en: Tableware for outdoor use should ideally be unbreakable.
sentences.cn: 室外用的餐具最好是打不破的。

sentences.en: This new material is virtually unbreakable.
sentences.cn: 这种新材料实际上是不碎的。

sentences.en: This new product is rustproof, dustproof, and unbreakable.
sentences.cn: 这种新产品防锈, 防尘并且摔不坏.

sentences.en: Unbreakable PC Container, users could benefit from more cost - effective and guarantee quality.
sentences.cn: 耐用的PC容器也是质量和效率的保证.

sentences.en: Unbreakable unity, inseparable conjunction between the two.
sentences.cn: 这个合一是不能破坏的, 两者不能分开.

sentences.en: Unless one has an unbreakable steel - like spirit, one cannot accomplish momentous undertakings.
sentences.cn: 缺乏钢铁般的精神, 就不能干大事.

trans.tran_cn: 打不破的，不易碎的，钢铁
